bibl.title: The Public and Private Worlds of Theophanes of Hermopolis Magna.
bibl.note: The archive of Theophanes is one of the best examples of the transition from the pagan world to the christian world.

bibl.title: Bulletin of the John Rylands Library

bibl.seg: Malcolm Choat, The Public and Private Worlds of Theophanes of Hermopolis Magna.
Bulletin of the John Rylands Library 88 (2006) No. 1, pp. 41-75.
The archive of Theophanes is one of the best examples of the transition from the pagan world to the christian world.
